alert.note: Alert for Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 16 at 12:43AM EDT until October 16 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Northampton County near Bayford. * WHEN...Until 3 AM EDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is possible in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. NASSAWADOX CREEK AT BAYFORD VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.0 FT, MODERATE 3.5 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.0 FT, MODERATE 1.5 FT, MAJOR 2.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/11 PM 3.2 1.2 1.6 3 MINOR 16/11 AM 3.3 1.3 1.4 2 MINOR 17/12 AM 2.8 0.8 1.3 1 NONE 17/12 PM 3.1 1.1 1.2 2 MINOR 18/12 AM 2.5 0.5 1.0 1 NONE 18/01 PM 2.9 0.9 0.9 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
